作りかえる: (つくりかえる) - to remake; to remold; to remould; to convert; to reconstruct; to adapt; to parody; to alter
作りつける: (つくりつける) - to build in
作りなおす: (つくりなおす) - to remake; to rebuild
作り上げる: (つくりあげる) - to make up; to fabricate; to build up; to complete; to construct
作り付ける: (つくりつける) - to build in
作り出す: (つくりだす) - to manufacture/to produce/to raise (crops); to invent/to dream up/to create
作り名: (つくりな) - alias; pseudonym; pen name; nom de plume
作り声: (つくりごえ) - feigned voice; unnatural voice
作り手: (つくりて) - maker; builder; creator; tenant farmer
作り換える: (つくりかえる) - to remake; to remold; to remould; to convert; to reconstruct; to adapt; to parody; to alter
作り損じる: (つくりそんじる) - to fail in making
作り損なう: (つくりぞこなう) - to fail in making
作り方: (つくりかた) - style of building/construction/workmanship/way of making; recipe; how to grow (something)
作り替える: (つくりかえる) - to remake; to remold; to remould; to convert; to reconstruct; to adapt; to parody; to alter
作り機嫌: (つくりきげん) - feigning good feeling
作り物: (つくりもの) - artificial product/man-made product/imitation/fake/sham; fiction; decoration (e.g. for a festival); theatrical prop (esp. a large prop in noh or kyogen, e.g. tree, well, etc.); crop
作り皮: (つくりがわ) - (つくりかわ only) leather/tanned animal hide; kanji "leather" radical (radical 177)
作り直す: (つくりなおす) - to remake; to rebuild
作り立てる: (つくりたてる) - to adorn; to decorate; to dress up; to build up
作り笑い: (つくりわらい) - forced laugh; forced smile
作り置き: (つくりおき) - pre-made (esp. food); prepared in advance
作り話: (つくりばなし) - fiction; made-up story; fable; fabrication; myth
作り込み: (つくりこみ) - manufacturing/craftsmanship/build; (造り込み only) molding a sword blade
作り酒屋: (つくりざかや) - sake brewer; sake brewery
作り顔: (つくりがお) - affected look; made-up face
作り飾る: (つくりかざる) - to window-dress; to put on airs; to be pretentious; to pretend
作る: (つくる) - (造る usu. for large-scale building, manufacturing, etc. 創る usu. for creating) to make/to produce/to manufacture/to build/to construct; to prepare (food)/to brew (alcohol); to raise/to grow/to cultivate/to train; to till; to draw up (a document)/to make out/to prepare/to write; to create (an artistic work, etc.)/to compose; to coin (a phrase)/to organize/to organise/to establish/to found; to have (a child); to make up (one's face, etc.); to fabricate (an excuse, etc.); to form (a line, etc.); to set (a record); to commit (a sin, etc.)
作中: (さくちゅう) - story (of book, play, movie, etc.); narrative
作中人物: (さくちゅうじんぶつ) - characters (in a novel, movie, etc.)
作付面積: (さくづけめんせき) - planted area
作出: (さくしゅつ) - new creation; new invention; new production; new breed
作動中: (さどうちゅう) - in operation (of a machine, especially security cameras); in use; in action
作動油: (さどうゆ) - hydraulic oil; hydraulic fluid
作動電圧表示器: (さどうでんあつひょうじき) - operating voltage indicator
作務: (さむ) - work in a Zen temple (e.g. cleaning, working in the fields)
作務衣: (さむえ) - monk's working clothes; monk's non-spiritual clothes
作品: (sakuhin) - work (por exemplo, livro, filme, composição, etc.), opus, performance, production
作品名: (さくひんめい) - title (of a work of art)
作図: (さくず) - drawing a figure/drawing a diagram; construction
作図装置増分量: (さくずそうちぞうぶんりょう) - plotter step size
作庭: (さくてい) - creating a garden; gardener
作意: (さくい) - idea; design; motif; conception; intention
作成: (sakusei) - drawing up (por exemplo, documento legal, contrato, testamento, etc.), preparing, writing, framing, making, producing, creating, creation
作成システム: (さくせいシステム) - originating system
作成中: (さくせいちゅう) - under construction; in preparation
作成技術: (さくせいぎじゅつ) - implementation technique
作戦: (さくせん) - tactics/strategy; military or naval operations
作戦オーバーレー: (さくせんオーバーレー) - operation overlay
作戦会議: (さくせんかいぎ) - strategy meeting; council of war
作戦命令: (さくせんめいれい) - operation order
作戦地域: (さくせんちいき) - area of operation
作戦計画: (さくせんけいかく) - operation plan; scheme of operations; plan of campaign
作戦開始日: (さくせんかいしび) - start day for military operation; departure day; D-Day
作文の題: (さくぶんのだい) - subject of a composition
作柄: (さくがら) - crop conditions; quality (of art)
作業: (sagyou) - trabalho, operação, fabricação, serviço de fadiga
作業グループ: (さぎょうグループ) - working group
作業ディレクトリ: (さぎょうディレクトリ) - working directory
作業中: (さぎょうちゅう) - work-in-progress; working state
作業員: (さぎょういん) - laborer; labourer; blue-collar worker
作業員宿舎: (さぎょういんしゅくしゃ) - construction camp; bunkhouse; workers' living quarters
作業域: (さぎょういき) - work(ing) space; work(ing) area
